name: Knockback Strike
summary: You focus your strength into a blow powerful enough to push an enemy away from you.
description:
You focus your strength into a blow powerful enough to push an enemy away from you. Make an unarmed Strike. If you hit, attempt an Athletics check to Shove the target. This attack uses the same multiple attack penalty as your Strike, and doesnâ€™t count toward your multiple attack penalty.Traits

Concentrate: An action with this trait requires a degree of mental concentration and discipline.
